ApplicationUpgradeProgress ApplicationUpgradeProgress Class

In this Article

Edit

Represents the upgrade status of the application instance.

Syntax

Declaration

public sealed class ApplicationUpgradeProgressPublic NotInheritable Class ApplicationUpgradeProgress

    Object

Gets the type name of the application to be upgraded.

Gets the estimated elapsed time spent processing the current Upgrade Domain.

Gives the detailed upgrade progress for nodes in the current upgrade domain.

Gets the category of upgrade failure if the upgrade failed.

Gets the time at which the upgrade failed.

Gets the next upgrade domain for this upgrade progress.

Gets the rolling upgrade mode for this upgrade progress.

Gets the time at which the upgrade started.

Gets the version of the application type being upgraded.

Gets the evaluations which describe the data and the algorithm used by health manager to evaluate the application health.

UpgradeDescription

Gets the parameters that describe the behavior of the current upgrade.
UpgradeDomainProgressAtFailure
UpgradeDomainProgressAtFailure

Gets structured information about what actions were being performed by the system at the moment of upgrade failure.

UpgradeDomains
UpgradeDomains

Gets the collection of upgrade domains and their upgrade status for this application upgrade.
UpgradeDuration
UpgradeDuration

Gets the estimated elapsed time spent processing the current overall upgrade.
UpgradeState
UpgradeState

Gets the overall state of the application upgrade process.

GetChangedUpgradeDomains(ApplicationUpgradeProgress)
GetChangedUpgradeDomains(ApplicationUpgradeProgress)

Specifies a helper method that returns a collection of upgrade domains that have changed to the RollingForwardCompleted state or the RollingForwardInProgress state since the GetChangedUpgradeDomains(ApplicationUpgradeProgress) method was called.

Methods

  • Edit
    GetChangedUpgradeDomains(ApplicationUpgradeProgress)
    GetChangedUpgradeDomains(ApplicationUpgradeProgress)

    Specifies a helper method that returns a collection of upgrade domains that have changed to the RollingForwardCompleted state or the RollingForwardInProgress state since the GetChangedUpgradeDomains(ApplicationUpgradeProgress) method was called.

    public ReadOnlyCollection<UpgradeDomainStatus> GetChangedUpgradeDomains(ApplicationUpgradeProgress previousProgress)Public Function GetChangedUpgradeDomains(previousProgress As ApplicationUpgradeProgress) As ReadOnlyCollection(Of UpgradeDomainStatus)

    Parameters

    • previousProgress
      ApplicationUpgradeProgress
      ApplicationUpgradeProgress

      The previous ApplicationUpgradeProgress object.

    Returns

    • ReadOnlyCollection<UpgradeDomainStatus>
      ReadOnlyCollection(Of UpgradeDomainStatus)

      A helper method that returns a collection of upgrade domains.

    Exceptions

    • ArgumentException
      ArgumentException

      The application name or the application type of the previousProgress parameter does not match the application name or application type of this object.
